conditions.summary: Triggers when player readies a spell containing a single specific effect.

summary: Triggers when the player character clicks on a foe.
Triggers when the player character clicks on a foe and shows a message.
Triggers when the player character clicks on a foe and the required amount of gold can be deducted, otherwise a different task is triggered.
overloads: clicked ${1:_foe_} and at least ${2:nn} gold otherwise do ${3:task}

conditions.summary: Starts target task if the required amount of gold can be deducted, otherwise a different task is triggered.
Triggers when character reaches minimum value for specified attribute.
Triggers when player enters/exits a certain location area.
Triggers when player has reached specified skill level or higher.

actions.summary: Changes whether or not a quest foe is attackable by other NPCs.
Makes all foes hostile, or clears (removes) them all.
Adds a text entry to the player journal as a note.
Take an amount from player, and start a task depending on if they could pay.
Plays a song from MIDI.BSA using SongFiles enum.

Starts another quest and waits for its termination, then sets task for success or failure. Sets failure task immediately if target quest is not found. Will ensure that target quest is also terminated if still running when parent quest ends.
Sets a variable. Can be unset with **_clear_**.
Unrestrains a foe restrained by RestrainFoe.

Updates the world data system to use a specific variant for a given place (location, block, building) either for all instances or for a particular location. Specify a single dash for variant to remove any existing variant.
overloads: worldupdate location at ${1:nn} in region ${2:nn} variant ${3:variant}
worldupdate locationnew named ${1:locationName} in region ${2:nn} variant ${3:variant}
worldupdate block ${1:blockName} at ${2:nn} in region ${3:nn} variant ${4:variant}
worldupdate building ${1:blockName} ${2:nn} at ${3:nn} in region ${4:nn} variant ${5:variant}
